title: I Just Got A Shot Of A Coronavirus Vaccine. I Hope It Works!
description: I'm taking part in a clinical trial that could help end the pandemic.
content: SEATTLE At 10:16 Pacific time Wednesday morning, I received an injection in my left shoulder. It contained 250 micrograms of an experimental coronavirus vaccine, the first to be tested in humans. I am one of 45 volunteers taking part in a Phase 1 clinical tri… [+7029 chars]
